Package com.client.pane.game.player

Class PlayerAbstract

java.lang.Object
com.client.pane.game.player.PlayerAbstract
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable, IPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotAI, MultiPlayer, Player
public abstract class PlayerAbstract extends Object implements IPlayer
abstract class of the player. general methods and attributes are implemented in here
